reviewText: Good learning tool if you want to learn about yoga, meditation and the Deepak Chopra Ayurveda  Center.
Great video and definitely worth the price!  It was shipped fast and arrived as promised.
LOVE THIS PRACTICE, BECAUSE IT IS NEVER TOO MUCH IF YOU HAVE NOT BEEN PRACTICING. EASY DOES IT AND EFFECTIVE.

This is a basic introduction to yoga, meditation and Ayurveda.  I use this for a short yoga session and meditation.  It is informative if you are just beginning.  I would like to obtain more from this yoga instructor.  It would be nice to have additional dvd's to add to this one to move on as there are 2 short yoga sessions and 2 meditations.
